Detailed Description

The header file describes the ZGP Structures involved.

Version:
: 1_0

The file describes the types and interface of the ZCL GreenPower Cluster

Author:
Microchip Corporation: http://www.microchip.com
Support email: support@microchip.com

Definition in file zgpClusterStructure.h.

Define Documentation

#define NO_OF_SINK   1

Attributes and commands for determining basic information about a device, setting user device information such as location, enabling a device and resetting it to factory defaults.
